## ZCurve class

Z-Curve encoder/decoder and optimized bbox range extraction for arbitrary dimensions (<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->= 2). Supports max. 32bit per-component value range and resulting Morton codes encoded as `BigInt`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ZCurve<T extends Range2_64> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(dim, bits, order)](./morton.zcurve._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ZCurve</code> class |

|  [dim](./morton.zcurve.dim.md) |  | <code>T</code> |  |
|  [masks](./morton.zcurve.masks.md) |  | <code>bigint[]</code> |  |
|  [order](./morton.zcurve.order.md) |  | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> |  |
|  [wipeMasks](./morton.zcurve.wipemasks.md) |  | <code>bigint[]</code> |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bigMin(zcurr, zmin, zmax)](./morton.zcurve.bigmin.md) |  | Computes the next valid Z index in bbox defined by <code>zmin</code> / <code>zmax</code> and greater than <code>zcurr</code>. Returns -1 if no further indices are in the box. |
|  [decode(z, out)](./morton.zcurve.decode.md) |  | Decodes given Z index into point coordinates. |
|  [decodeComponent(z, bits, dims, offset)](./morton.zcurve.decodecomponent.md) | <code>static</code> | Decodes a single nD component from given Z index. |
|  [encode(p)](./morton.zcurve.encode.md) |  | Encodes given nD point as Z index. |
|  [encodeComponent(x, bits, dims, offset, out)](./morton.zcurve.encodecomponent.md) | <code>static</code> | Encodes a single nD point component as partial Z index. |
|  [initMasks()](./morton.zcurve.initmasks.md) |  |  |
|  [loadBits(mask, bitPos, z)](./morton.zcurve.loadbits.md) |  |  |
|  [merge(zparts)](./morton.zcurve.merge.md) |  |  |
|  [pointInBox(p, rmin, rmax)](./morton.zcurve.pointinbox.md) |  |  |
|  [range(rmin, rmax)](./morton.zcurve.range.md) |  | Yields iterator of Z-curve indices in given nD bounding box. |
|  [split(z, out)](./morton.zcurve.split.md) |  | Decomposes given Z index into individual bit patterns, one per dimension. |
